short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Store all your whitelists in one place. Made specially for RCC community.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to store list of NFT projects that the user is whitelisted for. Remembering your NFT mint dates/prices/projects made easy with this extension. Simply fill up fields and click on the submit button. Thats it. Your project is always by your side. When you have minted the project simply click on delete button.
